name: Kungfu Charlies
description:
Kungfu Charles is a freeware game that was included on the cover disc of the UK Amiga magazine 'The One' in June 1994.

It is a single player platform game in which the player controls a character in a judo suit. The objective is to kill all the bad guys from each screen in order to progress to the next. The game comprises a series of levels, called floors in the game, with multiple screens or rooms per level. When all the rooms on a floor are cleared the player can progress to the next floor.

shot.caption: This is the high score table. It comes with some pretty high scores already entered.
Each level is password protected so the player.
